testsuite.name: Testing different requests like CREATE, READ, UPDATE and DELETE on Services Endpoint of the BestBuy API playground application.

testcase.name: Check if the Services data can be accessed by user
Check if user can CREATE a new service on services endpoint
Check if user can READ a newly created service on services endpoint
Check if user can UPDATE a newly created service on services endpoint
Check if user can delete a newly created service on services end point
